subject.normal: [squid-users] Disable "Subdomain" from being put through the Accelerator

headers.subject: Re: [squid-users] Disable "Subdomain" from being put through the Accelerator

quote.quotepara: By default, we have *.battlestarwiki.org gone through squid. However, we like to remove blog.battlestarwiki.org from being stored in squid. How can this be done...

body.para: Seems you can use "cache deny" command in the squid.conf
something like : ---- acl blog url_regex blog.battlestarwiki.org cache deny blog ----
body.footer: -- Jérémy Lardon Laboratoire DIOM, équipe SATIn - Doctorant 04 77 48 50 34
